segments.text: Hello Mr Janus . What can we do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Miao Ping . It's that time again ; I want to convert my salary . You know , it's so annoying . I wish my company could just pay me in RIB .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Haha ! I actually think that many locals would disagree with you ; they are all dying to be paid in US dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I guess you are right . So , do you need my passport ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , Mr Janus . Of course I trust you , but regulations are regulations .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . And of course , could you fill in the exchange form ?
segments.speaker: S1
